scripts.watch: cd ./app && test -d dist/assets || mkdir -p dist/assets && cp -a src/assets/. dist/assets && watchify -t vueify -p [ vueify/plugins/extract-css -o dist/main.css ] -e src/js/main.js -o dist/main.js -v
scripts.copy-assets: cd ./app && test -d dist/assets || mkdir -p dist/assets && cp -a src/assets/. dist/assets
